name: WW2 Rebuilder: Germany Prologue (itch)
description:
WW2 Rebuilder: Germany Prologue is out now!

Get the newest prologue version of WW2 Rebuilder right now.  It’s a first-person building simulator, set after the biggest military conflict in human history – World War 2. The map available in this version is completely FREE. Check out our Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1906590/

The story of Hamburg

In the newest addition players get to play as a woman, that after many loses, decides to help with rebuilding Hamburg – the city where her husband got sevearly burned during bombings in 1943. The area around Church of Saint Nicholas is the first place that we get to see in this part of the game. We get the full story of Trümmerfrau, one of the women who helped with rebuilding Germany after the horrific experiences of war. Stories about war often seem to miss out on the experiences of civilians. In this game it’s the opposite - they are in the center.

Prologue to our WW2 Rebuilder got released on 26.07.2022 and it's already getting a lot of attention! We got to the list of the most popular new releases of Steam and we have a lot of great reviews. 

Join our community!

For any help regarding our game or to report a bug join our discord: https://discord.com/invite/5NB6wKjQBx

Tune in and follow us on social media for more informations on upcoming updates. 

https://www.facebook.com/MadneticGames

https://twitter.com/madnetic_games
